title: High School Horror | True Ghost Stories
description:
Today, on a chilling episode of Real Ghost Stories online that nine out of ten veterinarians agree, could be toxic to the health of small dogs named puddles. 

What should have been a simple high school prank that a group of friends planned to look back and laugh about, turned into a trauma that will haunt these teens for the rest of their natural lives. 

Who got the final laugh this time?

That story, and much more, today, On Real Ghost Stories Online.

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!

To get access to:

  • The Worlds LARGEST AUDIO ARCHIVE of GHOST STORIES!
  • New EPP Bonus Episodes Every Week and ALL of our past EPP Bonus Episodes
  • Advance Episodes of the show (ALL AD FREE)

Then sign up to be a supporter, we call them "EPP's" (Extra Podcast People)!
